Ambrosio, Francesco
Pasquarello, Alfredo
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Extrinsic Defects in Amorphous Oxides: Hydrogen, Carbon, and Nitrogen Impurities in Alumina
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: extrinsic defects
Carbon
total charge
alumina
hydrogen
carbon
nitrogen
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This entry provides the most stable defect configurations of hydrogen, carbon, and nitrogen impurities in alumina, which are identified through ab initio molecular dynamics in various charge states and structural relaxations with the PBE functional. The structural configurations related to carbon and nitrogen impurities are found to depend on the total charge set in the simulation cell.
